front.title: DPNSS/DASS 2 extensions to the IUA protocol

abstract.t: This document defines a mechanism for backhauling of DPNSS/DASS2 messages over IP by extending the ISDN User Adaptation Layer Protocol Version 9 (<draft-ietf-sigtran-iua-09.txt>). The document aims to become an Appendix to IUA and to be the base for a DUA implementation.
